sqlMap.select: SELECT BT.SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP, BT.MEMBER_NM, BT.ORG_NM, BT.POSITION_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BT.START_D,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') START_D , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BT.END_D,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') END_D, BT.PLACE, BT.PURPOSE,BT.BUSINESS_TRIP_NO, BT.DRAFT_NM, BT.DRAFT_ORG_NM, BT.EMPL_TYP, F.ORG_FILE_NM FROM T_BUSINESS_TRIP BT LEFT OUTER JOIN T_FILE F ON BT.SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP = F.TABLE_SEQ AND F.TABC_TYP = 'BT' AND F.RECODE_ST='A' WHERE BT.SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP=#seq#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_BUSINESS_TRIP (SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP,MEMBER_NM,START_D,END_D, PLACE, PURPOSE, DRAFT_NM, DRAFT_ORG_NM, REG_ID, REG_DT,RECODE_ST, EMPL_TYP, BUSINESS_TRIP_NO, ORG_NM, POSITION_NM) VALUES(#seq#, #member_nm#, #start_d#, #end_d#, #place#, #purpose#, #draft_nm#, #draft_org_nm#, #user_id#, sysdate, 'A', #sel_typ#, #bt_no#, #org_nm#, #position_nm#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_BUSINESS_TRIP SET MEMBER_NM = #member_nm#, ORG_NM = #org_nm#, POSITION_NM = #position_nm#, START_D = #start_d#, END_D = #end_d#, PLACE = #place#, PURPOSE = #purpose#, BUSINESS_TRIP_NO = #bt_no#, DRAFT_NM = #draft_nm#, DRAFT_ORG_NM = #draft_org_nm#, EMPL_TYP=#sel_typ#, UPD_ID=#user_id#, UPD_DT=sysdate WHERE SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP = #seq#
sqlMap.insert: insert into T_FILE (TABLE_SEQ ,TABC_TYP, FILE_DIR,ORG_FILE_NM ,FILE_SIZE ,SEQ_FILE, REG_ID, REG_DT, RECODE_ST, FILE_NM) VALUES(#seq# ,'BT', #file_dir_nm# ,#file_org_nm# ,#file_size# ,SEQ_FILE.nextval, #user_id#, sysdate, 'A', #file_name#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_FILE SET RECODE_ST = 'D', UPD_ID=#user_id#, UPD_DT=sysdate WHERE TABLE_SEQ = #seq# AND TABC_TYP='BT' AND RECODE_ST='A'
UPDATE T_BUSINESS_TRIP SET RECODE_ST = 'D' WHERE SEQ_BUSINESS_TRIP = #seq#
